'''2.1.4998''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.4999''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5000''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is a [[launcher]] beta version released on June 17, 2019, which updated translations and fixed a bug.<ref name="tweet">{{tweet|slicedlime|1140572459034402817|An updated beta version of the Minecraft Launcher is now rolling out.<br>Changes in this version:<br>- Fixed a bug causing some players to be unable to log in.<br>- Updated translations.}}</ref><ref name="changelog">https://piston-meta.mojang.com/mc/launcher_beta_changelog.md</ref>

== Changes ==
; Translations
* Updated translations.<ref name="tweet"/>

== Fixes ==
;[https://bugs.mojang.com/issues/?jql=project+%3D+MCL+AND+fixVersion+%3D+2.1.4998-2.1.5000 1 bug fixed]
* {{bug|MCL-11001}} – Cannot login using the new beta launcher
